this_title: Natural World - Giraffes: Africa's Gentle Giants
trans_title: 长颈鹿：非洲的温柔巨人
introduction: Everyone loves giraffes, but what do we really know about them? Dr Julian Fennessy starts to reveal their secrets - the most important being that they are disappearing. In an urgent and daring mission, with a determined Ugandan team, he plans to round up 20 of the world's rarest giraffe to take across and beyond the mighty Nile River. The stakes are high, but if they succeed the reward will be a brighter future for an animal we have somehow overlooked.
chinese_title: 长颈鹿：非洲的温柔巨人
foreign_title: Natural World - Giraffes: Africa's Gentle Giants
